long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can easy copy ChatGPT prompt and response to notion database easily and fast by the extension. 

How to use?
1. Select text
2. Right click your mouse
3. Copy to notion database(table).


How to configure the extension?

1. Click the extension button.
2. Add a action.
3. Add your aciton name whiich will show when you click right your mouse in the website page.(edit it like: copy to prompt Or copy to result)
4. Add your DB_ID
5. Add your Token
6. Click get button and choose the column.
7. Click confirm button.

You need to get token from:
  https://www.notion.so/my-integrations
add a new integration and get your own token.
Add this new connection in Notion's setting list.


You need to get DB_ID from looking the Notion page in website url bar:
  https://www.notion.so/[long_hash_1]?v=[long_hash_2]
long_hash_1 is your db_id.
